task.title: How to substact numbers
task.shortdesc: Hre you will find instructions about using the substraction feature of JPS Calculator app.

prereq.p: To successfully substact numbers, you must know what is substraction.

result.p: The result from subtractino is displayed.

example.p: You want to subtract 2 from 3. The equation will look like: 3-2=1. You enter 3. Press minus. Enter 2. Press equals.
The result 1 appears on the screen.
